entry.value: # create flow variables for point labelling%%00010labels = []%%00010max_n = 0%%00010proteins = []%%00010%%00010if flow_variables['specific_label'].strip() != '':%%00010%%00009labels = [x.strip() for x in flow_variables['specific_label'].split(flow_variables['delim'])]%%00010%%00010%%00009for label in labels:%%00010%%00009%%00009try:%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009x = int(label)%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009max_n = x%%00010%%00009%%00009except ValueError:%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009proteins.append(label)%%00010%%00010flow_variables['max_n'] = max_n%%00010flow_variables['label_proteins'] = flow_variables['delim'].join(proteins)%%00010%%00010# modify subtitle variable%%00010thresholds = 'Visualization thresholds: logFC ' + str(flow_variables['logFC_threshold']) + ', P ' + str(flow_variables['p_threshold'])%%00010%%00010if flow_variables['subtitle'].strip() != '':%%00010%%00009flow_variables['full_subtitle'] = flow_variables['subtitle'] + '\n' + thresholds%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['full_subtitle'] = thresholds%%00010%%00010# plot size%%00010if flow_variables['plot_size'] == '':%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_width'] = 600%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_height'] = 600%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_width'], flow_variables['plot_height'] = flow_variables['plot_size'].split(';')%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_width'] = int(flow_variables['plot_width'].strip())%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_height'] = int(flow_variables['plot_height'].strip())%%00010%%00010# modify title variable%%00010if flow_variables['plot_width'] < 400:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['title'] = 'Volcano plot\nwith selected categories'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['title'] = 'Volcano plot with selected categories'
